main event: A ground radar tracked an unidentified object chasing a radar target in a southwest direction for 5 minutes in Silver Grove, Kentucky on February 7, 1953 at 2130 hours.
interesting points: The unidentified object was tracked on ground radar until it was lost.
The object was chasing a radar target in a southwest direction.
The witness was a 15-year-old who estimated the object's speed to be 1.75 miles per minute and the distance to be 4 miles.
This was not the first time the witness had seen an unidentified object.
sighted object: unidentified object tracked on ground radar
